name: id
description: The ID of the contents list.

name: items
description: Array of content list items objects.

params.name: href
params.description: The `href` attribute for the content list item label. Required unless `item.current` is set.

params.name: current
params.description: Set to `true` to indicate the current page the user is on.

params.name: text
params.description: If `html` is set, this is not required. Text to use within each content list item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: html
params.description: If `text` is set, this is not required. HTML to use within each content list item label. If `html` is provided, the `text` argument will be ignored.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the content list item label.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the content list item label.

name: landmarkLabel
description: The label for the navigation landmark that wraps the contents list. Defaults to `"Pages in this guide"`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the content list container.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the content list container.

name: visuallyHiddenTitle
description: Visually hidden title for the contents list items. Defaults to `"Contents"`.
